title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
created_time: April 17, 2023, 04:21:00 PMLast edit: April 18, 2023, 04:37:23 PM by jeremypwr
content: UFC Fight Night 222 Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 2 mbtc Free Bet2nd place: 1 mbtc Free Bet3rd place: 0.5 mbtc Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-fight-night-pavlovich-vs-blaydes/matchesMatches(2 points each)13. Sergei Pavlovich vs Curtis Blaydes12. Song Yadong vs Ricky Simon11. Brad Tavares vs Bruno Silva10. Bobby Green vs Jared Gordon9. Iasmin Lucindo vs Brogan Walker-Sanchez8. Jeremiah Wells vs Matthew Semelsberger(1 point each)7. Ricky Glenn vs Christos Giagos6. Rani Yahya vs Montel Jackson5. Karol Rosa vs Norma Dumont4. Mohammad Usman vs Junior Tafa3. Francis Marshall vs William Gomis2. Priscila Cachoeira vs Karine Silva1. Brady Hiestand vs Danaa BatgerelNOT go the Full Distance  Make sure your Prediction is in this format  Example13. Sergei Pavlovich 12. Song Yadong 11. Brad Tavares10. Bobby Green 9. Iasmin Lucindo8. Jeremiah Wells 7. Ricky Glenn 6. Rani Yahya 5. Karol Rosa 4. Mohammad Usman 3. Francis Marshall 2. Priscila Cachoeira 1. Brady Hiestand NOT go the Full Distance 5(Small print)* Must be active in Sports betting and/or Sports betting discussion (some exceptions) *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **
